title: Legs
creator_credit: Jerrold Freedman, Ron Parker, Franklin R. Levy, Comworld Productions, Radio City Music Hall Productions and Catalina productions
brief_description: Three young hopefuls, Terry (Deborah Geffner), Melissa (Maureen Teefy) and Lisa (Shanna Reed) aspire to become part of the The Radio City Music Hall Rockettes, one of the world’s most famous and glamorous chorus lines. The story revolves around their auditioning, their hard work, successes and failures and of course their romances. Cast also includes John Heard, Sheree North, David Marshall Grant and Gwen Verdon.
